mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, author, view_count as viewCount, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM board ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, title, content, author, view_count as viewCount, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM board WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( title, content, author, view_count, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{author}, 0, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
